access: You'll have all studio for yourself! Gym access, washer & dryer available at the building. Everything that you need for a comfortable stay.
description:
Best location you can find! Just steps from the Chicago River Walk, Magnificent Mile, Michelin restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores; right in the middle of the River North - also close to downtown. Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and small families. Fully equipped, you will find everything you need to have a perfect stay, and to explore the city, you will find transportation at your doorstep. The building offers pool and gym for the guests.

The apartment is a great place to relax and unwind after a day of conferences, shopping, exploring Chicago, or whatever it may be. 
Enjoy the privacy of your own flat during your stay. Full of helpful amenities and little luxuries, it's the perfect place to call home for a weekend, or extended stay. Prepare a home-cooked meal in its fully equipped kitchen with everything you need. Enjoy the baths with soaps, shampoos, and more bathrooms amenities like hairdryers and extra large towels.

Enjoy a great night's sleep in the queen sized, with linens, pillows and extra blankets. Sit and watch in front of the Smart TV your favorite movie on Netflix with our complimentary Wi-Fi with high speed.

You'll have all studio for yourself! Gym access, washer & dryer available at the building. Everything that you need for a comfortable stay.

We are always available and will try to answer your questions as quickly as we can.

Flexible time for check-in. Send us a message and we will arrange it for you.

access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment, however doors that are locked are private.
description:
Want city living without the traffic and crowds? We are perfectly situated for you to have all the convenience of quick public or highway transit to Chicago while staying in a safer family friendly environment.  Oak Park has tons of history, cool shops,  award winning dining, amazing Frank Lloyd architecture, and even backyard chickens with fresh eggs to enjoy!

There is a backyard deck  for your outdoor enjoyment and a chicken coop to watch for your outdoor amusement. The downstairs unit has the 2 friendliest and most adorable Basset hounds that will often nap in the yard as well.
Well appointed kitchen, Keurig, toaster oven, dishwasher, everything you need to make a gourmet meal or keep your trip on a budget.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment, however doors that are locked are private.

We are quickly available if anything is needed during your stay and let us know if you want ideas on cool places to visit or yummy restaurants to enjoy, tell us your tastes and we will help you find where to explore.

We are steps to the Oak Park Arts District with cool galleries, shops and restaurants and directly next door to Barrie Park with playground, large sled hill and open fields for outdoor fun!

We are located walking distance from the Blue line L stop so you can travel without a car and only a few blocks from the Eisenhower Expressway for a quick trip to downtown Chicago.

The keypad deadbolt locks will be coded for the last 4 digits of the primary guest's phone number.

access: Guests have access to the kitchen and all of the ammenities.
description:
A new 3 bedroom condo with two rooms available. Both have a comfortable full size bed, desk, mirror and no clutter of any kind. Parking is free and easily available. I work nights so i am away for most evenings.

This condo is on the second floor and has a great view of the neighborhood. It is very close to the train to downtown. There is a large park with a lake across the way and a long above ground bike trail nearby.

Guests have access to the kitchen and all of the ammenities.

I am always available by phone and you may see me in and out or i may help check you in. I work nights.

Wicker park is close with lots of shopping and late night bars. Down the street is a Cuban restaurant and a great sports bar.

The train to downtown is just down the street.

My dog Beau is very friendly. He does not bark and is very chill. He is a Shihtzu breed and is therefore hypo- allergenic and does not shed. This is 3 bedroom with two to rent, therefore, there may be another guest or guests in the room adjacent. Although check out is at 10:00 a.m. this is just for the room to be changed. Anyone can continue to be in the condo or is welcome to leave their luggage in the living room if their flight departs later in the day.

access: You will have the entire first floor apartment.
description:
Awesome 2 bedroom/1 bathroom in one of Chicago's top neighborhoods. Trendy boutiques, outdoor cafes, and great restaurants and bars. Very family friendly neighborhood with plenty to do with family and friends!

This is our 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom fully furnished apartment in the heart of Roscoe Village. Whether you‚Äôre planning a weekend excursion, business trip or need a comfortable place to stay for family or friends, consider our Guesthouse.

You will have the entire first floor apartment.

We are a full service vacation rental agency, with a virtual front desk and concierge.

Trendy Roscoe Village offers boutique shopping and a variety of restaurants & bars.

The apartment is approximately 4.5 blocks from Paulina ‚Äú El‚Äù stop which will take you downtown. It's also about 4 blocks away from a Wrigley shuttle stop!

We do have a 4 bedroom 2 bath unit in the same building that could sleep an additional 10 guests. The property can accommodate up to 16 total guests.

additional_house_rules:
1) The entire property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, They react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens¬Æ technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed.

5) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

6) Lost keys will incur a $100 charge. We have to change the locks. Please use the app to send a picture of all the keys at check-in AND check-out.

7) We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans.

8) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.


Privacy Statement on the Use of Security Cameras:
We respect and value the privacy of our guests. We will never place a camera inside a living space. While Airbnb policy allows cameras in spaces that are not used for sleeping or bathing, we disagree. Cameras should be banned from inside all living spaces. Footage should be automatically deleted. Everything should be disclosed in advance. We use hallway security cameras to verify the number of guests who have entered an apartment. This is useful for stopping parties, and under additional prices extra guest charges may apply for extra people sleeping over.  All footage is deleted automatically after a stay, unless there is an open resolution center case. It‚Äôs unfortunate that not every guest is honest about their intentions, and our community would not allow us to be on Airbnb if we did not prevent unwanted behaviors. Let us know if you have questions. We have nothing to hide.

access:
The entire apartment is yours during your stay! Book for one person or five, it doesn't matter - you WILL NOT share this apartment with anyone outside of your own group! 

The sundeck, gym, and lobby are shared spaces, and you should be respectful of that. 

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), and the cleaners may still be in the apartment until 4PM.

Unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.
description:
Quiet, modern, industrial styled luxury loft with the best location in Wrigleyville! 1 block from the red line in the most sought-after neighborhood for young people to live. Wrigleyville is known for its overabundance of restaurants, bars, boutiques, and coffee shops abounding on every corner.  Street festivals, theatres, concert halls, and comedy clubs are never far. This is the mythical neighborhood experience everyone on Airbnb talks about.

Flooded with natural light and concrete ceilings that soar, the feeling is airy, spacious, industrial luxury. This is a brand-new, high rise building from the ground up!

Want advice? Looking for that local knowledge? We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion!

GET READY! Freshen up in your brightly lit bathroom, featuring:
- glass walled shower
- amazing high-pressure shower-head
- towels, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner provided for all guests

GET COFFEE! Kick the morning into overdrive with a caffeine jolt!
Choose from a wealth of coffee options and equipment: 
- French press and drip machine
- ground AND whole bean coffee
- sweeteners and half/half are all provided
- Starbucks is also across the street!

GET WORKING with smoking fast WiFi! 
- two dedicated signals per apartment! 
- 100MBPS Service with a 1750MPBS Router. 
- no more wimpy hotel WiFi!

GET COOKING in your full kitchen! 
All the amenities you'd expect from a luxury building:
- stainless steel appliances
- solid quartz countertops
- dishwasher
- salt, pepper, and oil stocked
- pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided!

GET OUT and enjoy Wrigleyville, Boystown, and Lakeview! 
Sports bars, nightclubs, casual dining, live music, karaoke bars, dives, LGBTQ spots... all right here!

GET A GOOD NIGHT'S REST to do it all again tomorrow
- Bedroom offers the coolest adult bunk beds you‚Äôve ever seen! 
Two king beds support 2,000 pounds! Plenty of don't-bang-your-head-clearance and an oversized ladder. They cost five grand, and are worth every penny! Everything about them was built for comfort. Read the reviews. Look at the pictures. People love our bunks!
- Twin memory foam rollaway bed ready for your use!
- Linens provided for every guest!

GET A LOCAL TAKE
Looking for that local knowledge? Want a no-BS take on the area?
We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion! Let us help!

And last but not least, enjoy the building's INCREDIBLE AMENITIES! 
Massive SUNDECK with fire pit and tons of seating on floor 3!
24-HOUR GYM with plenty of cardio equipment on floor 3! 
-----------
PARKING
There's a parking lot across the street which you can book in advance on an app.  It doesn't get much easier than that in Chicago.  Street parking is hard to find and not recommended.
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive the keys and drop their bags in the apartment as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work. 
If you'd like to drop your bags early, we can usually accommodate you!
If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
Unfortunately we *do not* have anywhere to hold bags after your stay - sorry!
----------
ROLLAWAY BED
The twin rollaway bed is prepared before every stay with fresh linens.
The bed is physically locked into the upright position to help make the bed super easy to move around, and placed in the closet. Simply roll it into place and open. Everything will be ready for you. 
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - five individuals. Anyone past five would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don‚Äôt bring a party back..
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate may change based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance!
----------
The pictures you see have accurate furniture, appliances, finishes, square footage - really everything! The art and positioning of items *might* be slightly different. Please don‚Äôt be concerned! Read the reviews! I assure you that the photos accurately represent what you will receive!

The entire apartment is yours during your stay! Book for one person or five, it doesn't matter - you WILL NOT share this apartment with anyone outside of your own group! 

The sundeck, gym, and lobby are shared spaces, and you should be respectful of that. 

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), and the cleaners may still be in the apartment until 4PM.

Unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.

We love our guests! We are available to our guests! 
We text our guests most of what they need! 
...WE NEED A NUMBER TO REACH YOU AT! 
Please confirm your phone number and email address upon booking.

IF YOU WILL NOT HAVE A US PHONE NUMBER, please download the WHATSAPP phone texting app! We also have WeChat - please provide your ID!

Clark and Belmont: the intersection of convenience and incredible city life! 
The Chicago Cubs play in the heart of this residential neighborhood, bringing a vibrancy far beyond the tourist/business district downtown.. Chicago‚Äôs North Side is the most prosperous with the most things to do, and this neighborhood is it's beating heart. Wrigleyville might look like it‚Äôs off center from downtown, but it‚Äôs really in the middle of everything. 

- Four blocks from Wrigley FIeld and the Chicago Cubs! Avoid game-day traffic and walk it - or take the train just one L stop! 
- Around the corner from Boystown, Chicago's famed LGBTQ neighborhood! Ask us for suggestions, don't be shy!
- Directly above Target - grocery runs couldn't be quicker
- Leisurely walk to Lake Michigan and the beautiful Lakeshore Path

Stay smack in the middle of the best bar scene on the north side! Sports bars, nightclubs, dance parties, karaoke - anything you want, Lakeview's got it. Perfect for a quick drink or last call. 

With so many bars, restaurants, and shops, you'll have no idea where to start - until you check out our curated guidebook! We'll give you a taste for starters.
CHEESIES, a casual bar three minutes away, has killer grilled cheese. The Popper is the best choice on the menu. We've only been after a few drinks, but we see people there all day. Good sign. 
11 DEGREE NORTH, across the street, has the most wonderful stuffed arepas and biscuit sandwiches made from scratch. This Venezuelan cafe is perfect for breakfast and brunch. Get the Pelua arepa, pot roast and cheese in a corn bread-like pocket.
THE CHICAGO DINER is the city's best vegetarian restaurant. Grab a vegan milkshake or the chicken-style pot pie.

We‚Äôve got tips about the best bars in Wrigleyville and Boystown, coffee shops and grab-and-go breakfast, high-end can't miss dinners, quick meals, late nights and boozy brunch, plus extensive day trips all throughout the city - plus what we consider the best Cubs game day experience. One word: bleachers. We put our heart into the guidebook, and you‚Äôll find advice on other can‚Äôt-miss places worth a train or Uber ride, including FIVE distinct nightlife districts throughout the city!

There's no need for a car here! 
- Two minute walk from the single most convenient public transit spot in Chicago - the Belmont Red Line L station!  Front door to downtown in 18 minutes flat!
Front door to Evanston in 20 minutes! (rush / express hours)
- INSTANTLY get an Uber or Lyft! This neighborhood has no waiting.


Take the CTA and go from front door to Chicago's... 

FRIENDLY CONFINES
- Cubs baseball, Wrigley Field: 6 min bus or L train,  or 11 min walk! 
Just 1 L stop, 4 bus stops, or a half-mile walk through Wrigleyville!

SELFIE SPOTS
- Millennium Park, the Bean (Cloud Gate), Maggie Daley Park: 22 min
- Sears Tower / Willis Tower (Skydeck Chicago): 25 min
- Magnificent Mile / Michigan Avenue shopping, Hancock Center (360 Chicago), Water Tower: 22 min
- Riverwalk: 18 min
- Lake Michigan, Belmont Harbor: 12 min

WORLD-CLASS CULTURAL INSTITUTIONS
- Grant Park, Buckingham Fountain, Chicago Marathon start: 25 min
- Art Institute of Chicago: 22 min
- Museum Campus, Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, Adler Planetarium: 34 min
- Lincoln Park Zoo: 18 min (best free zoo in the world!)
- Chicago Symphony Orchestra: 22 min
- Gene Siskel Film Center: 16 min
- Museum of Contemporary Art: 21 min
- Museum of Science and Industry (MSI): 24 min Uber
- Music Box Theatre: 14 min

BIGGEST THEATER SCENE OUTSIDE OF BROADWAY
- The Second City: 18 min
- The Chicago Theatre: 16 min
- The Joffrey Ballet: 17 min
- Goodman Theatre: 18 min
- CIBC Theatre (Hamilton): 19 min
- Auditorium Theater of Roosevelt University: 23 min
- Lyric Opera: 26 min
- Lookingglass Theater Company: 19 min
- Steppenwolf Theatre: 13 min

SPORTS AND STADIUMS
- Blackhawks Hockey, Bulls basketball, United Center: 43 min or 26 min Uber
- Bears football, Soldier Field: 34 min
- Guaranteed Rate Field, Chicago White Sox: 31 min (we're Cubs fans, but they have good food, and tickets are cheap)
- Northerly Island Pavilion: 38 min
- Wintrust Arena: 32 min

CONCERTS AND FESTIVALS
- The Vic Theatre: 5 min WALK!
- Schubas Tavern: 5 min
- Metro: 8 min
- Lincoln Hall: 12 min
- The Aragon Ballroom: 14 min
- The Riviera Theatre (Riv): 14 min
- The Green Mill Jazz Club: 14 min
- House of Blues: 21 min
- Lollapalooza: 26 min

UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES
- DePaul University: 12 min
- Northwestern University, Evanston: 32 min (purple line express), 24 min Uber
- University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC): 43 min, 22 min Uber
- The University of Chicago: 24 min Uber

CONVENTION CENTERS
- Merchandise Mart: 18 min
- McCormick Place: 43 min,  20 min Uber

AIRPORTS AND TRANSPORTATION
- O'Hare (ORD): 55 min
- Midway (MDW): 49 min
- Union Station (Amtrak): 30 min
- Millennium Station (South Shore Line): 22 min
- Ogilvie Transportation Center (Metra): 29 min

OVERRATED TOURIST TRAP
- Navy Pier: 36 min
Unless you have plans at the Children's Museum, Shakespeare Theater, or Imax theater - seriously, skip it. Ask us for recommendations instead.

Unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.

We guarantee smoke free rooms.  We use real time chemical air analysis to detect the concentration and location of marijuana and tobacco molecules.

We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans

Immediately after booking, we will send you a few questions about your arrival time, contact info, number of guests/visitors, and to name our favorite restaurant, which is listed at the bottom of the house rules. Guests will not be allowed to check in without providing complete answers
house_rules:
1) The entire property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, They react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens¬Æ technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed.

5) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

6) Lost keys will incur a $100 charge. We have to change the locks. Please use the app to send a picture of all the keys at check-in AND check-out.

7) We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans.

8) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.


Privacy Statement on the Use of Security Cameras:
We respect and value the privacy of our guests. We will never place a camera inside a living space. While Airbnb policy allows cameras in spaces that are not used for sleeping or bathing, we disagree. Cameras should be banned from inside all living spaces. Footage should be automatically deleted. Everything should be disclosed in advance. We use hallway security cameras to verify the number of guests who have entered an apartment. This is useful for stopping parties, and under additional prices extra guest charges may apply for extra people sleeping over.  All footage is deleted automatically after a stay, unless there is an open resolution center case. It‚Äôs unfortunate that not every guest is honest about their intentions, and our community would not allow us to be on Airbnb if we did not prevent unwanted behaviors. Let us know if you have questions. We have nothing to hide.

access: Guest has full exclusive access to the condo unit.
description:
Beautiful, newly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath condo located in the heart of Chicago Chinatown. Minutes to Downtown, McCormick Place, South Loop, Lake Michigan, Museum Campus, UIC, IIT, UofC, and Downtown Universities. Walking distance to public transportation (bus, train), grocery store, bank/ATM, Starbucks, hardware store, hair salon, pharmacy, and tons of good restaurants.

Suite has all amenities including tables, dining table, sofa, chair, high-speed WIFI internet access, and a 48" flat screen smart TV with ROKU.

Guest has full exclusive access to the condo unit.

I give my guests space but am available when needed

Chinatown
Chicago‚Äôs Chinatown is one of the largest neighborhoods of its kind in the US. Located on the city‚Äôs near South Side, the vibrant and energetic culture is reflected in the area‚Äôs many specialty shops, cultural cuisine and signature landmarks, like Ping Tom Memorial Park and a Buddhist Temple.
The main drag of Wentworth Avenue is a dim sum drenched display of Chinese food perfection. Along this epic street, you will discover restaurants, distinctive boutique shopping and the Chinatown Gate, a beautifully ornamented entryway to the neighborhood.
Just north of the Wentworth Avenue District is Chinatown Square, the largest Chinese mall in the Midwest. Besides hosting top restaurants, like Ken Kee, Phoenix or Lao Sze Chuan, you will find an incredible collection of public art that includes zodiac-inspired animal sculptures and twin pagodas. The area's signature piece, an enormous tile mosaic created by celebrated artists Yan Dong and Zhou Ping, represents the accomplishments of Chinese people in America. Rather poetically, the mural embodies the neighborhood as a significant gift to Chicago.

We're conveniently located near the intersection of Cermak Road and Wentworth Ave. Public transportation (bus, train) are less than a block away. Major highways  (I-90/94, I-290, I-55) all converge in this area. For the foodies, this is the place to be with many restaurants within walking distance and close by the downtown and South Loop area. Conventioneers will be glad to know that McCormick Place is a 16 minute walk/6 minutes drive away. See below for more details.

Driving distance to nearby Points of Interest:
Greektown (2.6 miles / 14 min)
Guaranteed Rate Field (1.2 miles / 5 min)
Illinois Institute of Technology (1.6 miles / 7 min)
Lincoln Park Zoo (7.8 miles / 20 min)
Little Italy (2.6 miles / 14 min)
Magnificent Mile (3.5 miles / 11 min)
McCormick Place (0.9 miles / 6 min)
Millennium Park (2.7 miles / 11 min)
Museum Campus (Aquarium, Field Museum, Adler Planetarium) - (1.8 miles / 10 min)
Navy Pier (5 miles / 15 min)
Soldier Field 2.3 miles / 7 min)
United Center (4 miles / 15 min)
University of Illinois at Chicago (2.7 miles / 11 min)
Wrigley Field (10.4 miles / 27 min)

Walking
Many of the city‚Äôs top attractions are a short walk or ride away from each other. Weather-permitting, walking is the best way to see the city and the hidden treasures of architecture and public art in the downtown area.
When planning your route, keep in mind that every 8 blocks equals 1 mile.

Chicago Public Transportation (CTA)
The buses and trains of the CTA (Chicago Transit Authority) are a fast and cost-effective way to get into and around the city. Known as the ‚ÄúL‚Äù (though they may be elevated or underground) the trains are a fun way to see The Loop from a new vantage point.
CTA visitor passes offer the best value, with unlimited rides on all CTA trains and buses. A 1-day pass is $10, a 3-day pass is $20, and a 7-day pass is $28.
Passes are easy to use. They activate the first time you use them and are valid for the number of consecutive days purchased. Just dip your pass into the bus fare machine or the train station turnstile.
Check the CTA website for the latest fares, travel alerts, and trip planners.

Taxis
Taxis are abundant throughout most of Chicago so finding a cab is typically easy. Taxi rates depend on gas prices and number of passengers and can get a bit pricey but provide a fast and convenient way to get around the city, particularly beyond downtown.

Biking
If time and weather permit, consider renting a bike. Chicago‚Äôs lakefront boasts 26 uninterrupted miles of easy bike and walking trails.
Half-day rentals are available from Bike and Roll at Navy Pier and Millennium Park.


From the Airports

O‚ÄôHare International Airport: 
Chicago‚Äôs O‚ÄôHare is one of the world‚Äôs busiest airports. It‚Äôs about 15 miles northwest of the Loop in downtown Chicago. O‚ÄôHare has 5 terminals, all of which have information booths and multilingual employees to assist you.

Midway International Airport:
Although it‚Äôs smaller than O‚ÄôHare, Midway is closer to the Loop and services more discount airlines (but fewer airlines overall). If you‚Äôre looking for a good deal on plane tickets, check out flights to Midway.

‚Ä¢ Check-in time 3 PM or later
‚Ä¢ Check-out before 12 PM
‚Ä¢ No Smoking (including e-cigarettes) in the house and common areas
‚Ä¢ No pets
‚Ä¢ No parties or events
‚Ä¢ Observe quiet hours from 9:00PM to 7:00AM 
‚Ä¢ Early check-in or late check-out can be accommodated based on occupancy and for a small fee. Please inquire if needed

highlights: [{'type': 'LISTING_ENTIRE_HOME_PROPERTY_TYPE', 'message': 'You‚Äôll have the condominium to yourself.', 'headline': 'Entire home'}]
description:
Live in a wonderful part of River North.  This fully furnished two-bedroom, two-bathroom corner unit is the perfect size for one or two people who would like a place in Chicago for work or for fun.  This unit has previously been a corporate rental, so it is well equipped for the solo business traveler or a business person with family.  The building features a 24 hour doorman, fitness room and bike room.  6 month minimum stay per condo guidelines. Discount for 1 year or longer leases.

The living and dining rooms flow together; featuring Brazilian cherry hardwood flooring, a flat screen cable-equipped TV, Wi-Fi, and a fireplace, but the most stunning feature may be the sweeping views of the city from the living room and balcony. The two bedrooms are spacious and outfitted with queen beds. A washer and dryer in the unit, and the provided weekly maid cleaning service will make life easy.

description:
This is a entire top-floor attic apartment. It is a  cozy, bright and clean oasis in a classic Chicago bungalow house.
We have a queen size bed with movable base, a private bath (with a bathtub, but no shower) .There is a small living room space with a TV and comfy couches and a large desk that is perfect to use as a remote work space. 
The apartment is perfect for 1 or 2 people who appreciate their peace, quite and privacy  but might also enjoy having a local host available around .

We interact with you, our guests, as little or as much as you are comfortable with. We will meet you at arrival and be available to answer any questions you might have. We live on the main floor of the house and are available if you need but mostly we like to allow you privacy and relaxation as our guest.

We are about 20 minutes from O'Hare airport and from downtown 25 to 35 minutes depending on the traffic, close to malls, restaurants, drugstore within 2 blocks, Target within 1 block.

access: Roof deck, balcony.
description:
Spacious loft with high timber ceiling, balcony & large windows. Airy & bright with easy street parking.  5-min walk to the Blue line that takes you to the Loop (downtown) in 20 min. Elevated park & bike path (606) is across the street.

I moved to Chicago from NYC for a Job and have been living in both cities ever-since which makes my home in chicago available quite often .  This loft is just that, a home, it is not a corporate rental.  we live here and the atmosphere of the apartment is reflective of our life.  I love art, antiques and unique items which you will find all around the apartment.  
Our neighborhood is quite a trendy area with great small and unique shops, restaurants and bars. 

I have been exchanging and renting for the many years and couldn't have had better experiences each and every time. I look forward to meeting you should you decide to stay at my home while in Chicago!

Roof deck, balcony.

Available for questions by text and phone.

Our neighborhood is quite a trendy area with lots of unique boutiques, small shops, restaurants. Bucktown, Logan square and wicker park neighborhoods are in walking distance. 
The 606 which is an elevated park/bike trail is across the street.

there is free, easy and available street parking.  The Blue line (L) is a 5-minute walk which will take you to the Loop (downtown) in 20 minutes.

description:
Cozy one bedroom with access to mini kitchen, family room and the back yard. Steps away from bus and easy access to trains. You'll love staying in this space where you can relax and enjoy piece of mind. My home is located on a safe, quiet street near restaurants and supermarkets. 2 minutes walk to bus stop and a 40 minute train ride to Downtown Chicago.

Cozy bedroom #3, in private home with access to mini kitchen, bathroom and family room. Relax and enjoy in this amazing place where you can unwind after a long day of exploring Chicago.

Guests have access to the level where the bedroom is located. There's a mini kitchen, family room, and small bathroom. We live upstairs, and have our own living space. Guests also have access to the back yard patio.

Guests have to walk through the side of the house and lift the gate latch to enter.

access: Guests are welcome on the main floor, back shared deck and lower level floor.
description: Indulge in the splendor of this debonair home. The unit features a private en suite bathroom, chic furnishings, and access to shared spaces including an expansive living room with a fireplace, and an outdoor patio lounge.
interaction: Our family will be here to ensure your comfort.
neighborhood_overview: The property is close to Wrigley Field, Brownline train station, Southport restaurants, Boystown, and much more.
space: A new World Series private room just a quick 15 minute walk from Wrigley and located in the heart of the Southport Corridor. Shared 1st floor features eat-in kitchen open to a large family room leading to a raised terrace. Private lower level has heated floors and two guests suites plus a family room/theatre room along with a wet bar. 1 car garage spot available with rental.
summary: Indulge in the splendor of this debonair home. The unit features a private en suite bathroom, chic furnishings, and access to shared spaces including an expansive living room with a fireplace, and an outdoor patio lounge.
transit: Our home is a short one city block away from the Southport Brown-line stop making it fast and affordable to experience the many diverse areas of our beautiful city.

access: The entire apartment is available for your use.
description:
This 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment is located in one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Chicago, Bucktown.
Far enough from downtown traffic but close enough that anywhere you want to go is just a few minutes away by cab or train. Bucktown is known for it's stylish boutiques, electric cafes, fun pubs & great summer festivals. A great neighborhood for food and fun all year long!

Large bedroom with a queen size bed and a walk-in closet to hang your clothes on the top floor. Fully stocked kitchen with a Keurig to make a quick cup of coffee. Otherwise, you can walk down to the block the local Starbucks or discover all the boutique coffee shops throughout the neighborhood. 
Large and comfortable couch with a pull out bed. Smart TV along with Wifi throughout the apartment.

The entire apartment is available for your use.

please feel free to message, text, or call if needed

Located in a quiet neighborhood with ample free parking. Apartment is located the top floor and does require to walk up stairs.

Modern 2 bedrooms/2 bathrooms with breathtaking panoramic views of the city & lake Michigan. The apartment bldg is the most modern bldg that have 5 stars amenities, top of the line, include gym, indoor pool, jaccuzzi/spa hot tub, steam room, sauna, lounge/game room & etc.
Located in Magnificent Miles, steps to Michigan Ave, Navy Pier & all iconic spots, NorthWestern Hospital, Millennium park & theater district.
WILL GIVE SPECIAL BIG DISCOUNT FOR FLORENCE EVACUATION PEOPLE OR INSURANCE COMPANIES.

2 blocks from Grand/State CTA red line train, but Uber is at thr door & is very cheap here to get around the city for let than $5 each time
